description: This file provides helper functions for extracting and setting various data types (string, int, double, bool) from JSON objects using the cJSON library. It is part of a JSON utility module in a larger codebase, providing abstractions to facilitate JSON parsing and manipulation.

methods.name: getCJSONString
methods.description: Extracts a string value from a JSON object for a specified key.

methods.name: getCJSONInt
methods.description: Extracts an integer value from a JSON object for a specified key.

methods.name: getCJSONDouble
methods.description: Extracts a double value from a JSON object for a specified key.

methods.name: getCJSONBool
methods.description: Extracts a boolean value from a JSON object for a specified key.

methods.name: setCJSONBool
methods.description: Sets the boolean value within a given JSON object.

methods.name: void cJSON_Delete__auto(cJSON ** json)
methods.description: Inline helper to automatically delete a cJSON object, preventing memory leaks.
